description:
This course shows you how we set up Podio as our CRM, there is no one "right way". This just happens to be the way we started to use it in our consulting business. This course should give you some ideas for your company.

“Marni, Congratulations on putting together such an effective explanation of how and why you use Podio. The integrated work flow and work space is quite remarkable. The promised possibility of continuing to use Daylite for CRM and doing some integration with Podio would be of great interest. Looking forward to that. Brian”
title: Why and how we use Podio in our consulting business
